entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of wet flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of wet flurries early in the morning. 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries late in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries in the evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 22 January 2023
